if i sit in a brooklyn coffee shop and work like this do i become a cartoon?

related, every scene with a wizard should occasionally involve them saying "shit I know there's a spell that does exactly that but... ah shit... lemme look at the last spell I did and see if I used it... ah damn it"
being a wizard is remembering the names of spells and being a hacker is remembering the name of obscure little programs that do exactly what you want, show me the difference

RT @MarginalCall: @mrejfox 2019, modern world discovers Mayans right about universe all along via twitter
@oneunderscore__ That’s amazing
My theory is unbeatable. Do the math yourself, guys! Everything checks out! https://t.co/1qichUsFfj

anyway the parallel universe where the spambot was left to continue it’s spambot poetry and wasn’t co-opted into a seemingly cynical viral PR stunt is the universe that is chugging along just fine, again, I have done the research

around 2011 or so in certain parts of the internet we all anointed this russian-spambot as our pinnacle of creative achievement which foretold, well, nothing because we are bad at paying attention to things

Some of you might be wondering “when exactly did our universe break into some sort of alternate radically absurd timeline” and after much study and research I have found the answer- and it was the moment we found out horse_ebooks wasn’t real. Do the math yourself.

this is how i code now 

(shout out cool-retro-term) https://t.co/Ww8iBlwUZH
@mdavidallen Yeah I think thats the vibe, and because of that no one is really selling theirs unless truly the worst fates befall them.

@mdavidallen If your familiar gets the death penalty, so do you, I think. And maybe serial numbers are large like license plates and those without them cant get far in the surveillance-laden world of 2050
Even the saddest and most poverty-stricken are aghast at the idea of selling their robot-familiar, even speaking the concept aloud is taboo even among the most vulgar.

In 2050, all human children are given a blank-slate robot at 13 to keep and raise as their familiars. Some teach them to do their chores. Others sit and converse, teaching them fantastic skills of creativity and art. In adulthood, others deploy them to earn an auxillary income.

If you dont think we are going to see Hong Kong-level protests and civil unrest in the united states in the short term future you are tripping, look around
All tech workers should be made to walk through encampments of radical activists and POC on their way home (as I did) - I cannot imagine how much better our world would be

Shoutout to the long time activists in Oakland who took in a bunch of idiot white tech people like me during Occupy and patiently and kindly began teaching us all the things we were ignorant of… Tactical Action Committee, Angela Davis, Bella, Melvin, and many many others https://t.co/uhQLZFpczY

This building- this city- this country is both old and young. But we have seen dark times before, our elders gave us tools to fight darkness
They didn't hand-cut these tiles to tell us the obvious. In dark times, it is good to remember the power of Thought and Word. Real power.
Thought is flanked by the Written and Spoken Word. Those things can and will change the world, the mosaic reminds me.
Every morning walking into work, I walk under the mosaic "Intelligence Awakening Mankind". It is both beautiful and a poignant reminder. https://t.co/LKEite58SQ
